channel.title: How Does The Recommender System Work on Recommender System Solution
channel.description: Recent content in How Does The Recommender System Work on Recommender System Solution

item.title: Develop Online Of Recommender System
item.description: In this part, you’ll change some code to add two features in online part, and then deploy them to your Recommender System. Add hot topic Open recommender-system-dev-workshop-code/src/filter/plugins/news/service.py file Go to line 355 and uncomment below code. # hot_topic_news_list = self.get_hot_topic_news_list(user_id, hot_topic_count, present_recommend_news_id_list, recommended_news_list) Push your change to your github repo cd /home/ec2-user/environment/recommender-system-dev-workshop-code/src/filter/plugins/news git pull git add service.py git commit -m "test for online development" git push Go to codebuild project to check gcr-rs-dev-workshop-filter-build, it should be triggered.

item.title: Develop Offline Of Recommender System
item.description: Experience recall logic Experience recall without keywords Open recall log GUI Click 4 ~ 5 news in the recommended list View recall log in argo GUI Experience recall with keywords Run below script to change recall config file: cd /home/ec2-user/environment/recommender-system-dev-workshop-code/scripts ./change-recall-config-offline.sh The old config file: The new config file: The recall config file has been changed and offline notified online to load new config file.
